module.name: specification_document
module.keywords: module, technology, parts, families, activity, surface, textures, coatings, interoperation, computer, language, material, testing, physical, functional, association

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of documents specifying aspects of a product including design, process, material, tests and programming languages.

inscope.li: specification of technology used for parts and part families;
specification describing an activity to be performed on a Product or Material;
specification of properties applicable to surface textures or coatings;
specification of the characteristics and constraints necessary for correct interoperation between specified units;
specification defining the syntax and semantics of a computer interpretable language;
specification of properties applicable to raw material, mixtures, or semi-fabricated material;
specification of information about the physical or functional testing of a Product;
structured texts that can have relationships to other structured texts for definition of any of these specifications;
association between a Specification definition and one or more Products;
items within the scope of application module Characteristic, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1654;
items within the scope of application module Configuration item, ISO/TS 10303-1056;
items within the scope of application module Document assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1122;
items within the scope of application module Person organization assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1013.
